data.what_is:
Higher Logic is the leading online community and marketing software solutions provider for associations. Meeting the unique needs of association professionals for more than 15 years, Higher Logic is a trusted partner serving 3,000+ customers, representing over 350,000 online communities with over 200 million users in more than 42 countries worldwide.
 
The Higher Logic Thrive portfolio contains three core products:

(1) Higher Logic Thrive Community is the online community engagement solution that is used and loved by more than 3,000 customers--the most in the association space--for making connections, sharing resources, and enabling discussions amongst members and your association.

(2) Higher Logic Thrive Marketing is the marketing and communications software of choice for associations like yours. With an industry-leading 99% deliverability rate, we enable you to reach the right member with the right message at the right time.

(3) Higher Logic Thrive Platform brings the power of Higher Logic Thrive Community together with Marketing to boost your engagement efforts and create a personalized member experience.

Built to scale as you grow, Higher Logic Thrive offers add-ons and third-party integrations with CRM, AMS and LMS providers. Our expert Advisors get you up and running quickly and you'll learn tips and tricks from decades of experience as you connect with a vast network in the Higher Logic Users Group (HUG).
data.product_description: Higher Logic is an industry leader in cloud-based community platforms, with over 25 million engaged members in more than 200,000 communities. Organizations worldwide use Higher Logic to bring like-minded people all together, by giving their community a home where they can share ideas, answer questions and stay connected.Higher Logic Thrive is purpose-built for associations to create an engaging member experience. As an association partner for more than 15 years, we understand associations and their unique challenges. When you're ready to grow, scale your solution with add-ons and third-party integrations.Not only do we provide industry-leading software, but we also equip users for success. Our customers gain access to a variety of customer success resources, including the Higher Logic Users Group (HUG) - our very own community where customers share and learn from each other. One of our customers recently told us, "I don't think I've come across better tutorials or training centers than yours."If you need expert advice or an extra hand to get things done, leverage our expert Advisors, our team of industry-leading community management and marketing strategists who help you maximize your ROI and accomplish your goals - fast.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file. 60 reviewers of Higher Logic Thrive have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: As reported in 47 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. This feature was mentioned in 31 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 58 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action. This feature was mentioned in 51 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc. 64 reviewers of Higher Logic Thrive have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies. This feature was mentioned in 24 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.  27 reviewers of Higher Logic Thrive have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.  This feature was mentioned in 66 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 31 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: As reported in 150 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. This feature was mentioned in 151 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 148 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores This feature was mentioned in 83 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: As reported in 81 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: As reported in 80 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion. This feature was mentioned in 104 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. 125 reviewers of Higher Logic Thrive have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: As reported in 74 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history. 55 reviewers of Higher Logic Thrive have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 65 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: As reported in 73 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization. This feature was mentioned in 39 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 39 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 61 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 39 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system. This feature was mentioned in 48 Higher Logic Thrive reviews.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: As reported in 58 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: As reported in 142 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 54 Higher Logic Thrive reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

initial_reviews.review_title: Feedback on Volunteer Manager
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The Volunteer Manager product allowed us to launch our Volunteer Program broadly to our membership. We were finally able to have an open call for volunteers that allowed for a transparent volunteer application and approval process and streamlined efficiencies in our organization. We have found new volunteers that we never would have found before with our prior process. Our volunteer engagement has increased dramatically and our pipeline of leadership and volunteers is stronger than it has ever been!

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The Mentor Match platform did not serve our members well. You should learn how the platform works and see if your members will be motivated to use that product by self servicing. We use Volunteer Manager for our mentoring program and that has worked really well for managing our mentor match program internally.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We did not have a Volunteer Management program across our association until we launched Volunteer Manager. This allowed us to improve our process, following best practices for volunteer management, and improved efficiencies .

Our volunteer engagement has increased dramatically and our pipeline of leadership and volunteers is stronger than it has ever been!

initial_reviews.review_title: Higher Logic proves to be a great connection resource
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The Higher Logic Thrive provides the needed resources to keep members connected. It supports our commities/sections/groups by giving them a place for file sharing and discussion. These tools are packaged in an easy to navigate platform, which is a stellar benefit for our members. And, on top of sll this, the Higher Logic support has always been quick, responsive, and helpful. Thanks!

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There is nothing to dislike. My only concern in there are so many tools to use, I want to endure I properly learn them to best maximize the product.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Committe/group management (files and discussions).

initial_reviews.review_title: HigherLogic: An Upgrade!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic Thrive provides our users with an experience that looks and feels more like the social sites they are used to using. For this reason, it encourages more interaction and provides the users with a smoother experience. I also can't say enough good things about the customer service support.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I look forward to Higher Logic Thrive coming out with more ways for site admins to customize the design and functions of their website.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Higher Logic Thrive is allowing our members to access our site and resources with greater ease. They are also implementing changes that make editing the website easier for admins.

initial_reviews.review_title: The bar has been set high for collaboration platforms - Higher Logic is the clear leader
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic continues to improve the user experience and administrative capabilities for Thrive. We are thrilled with their support and innovation.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The phrase, "you get what you pay for," is a good way to summarize their platform. We wanted the best, and we paid for the best. There are a lot of other products out there that may cost less, but at what cost? Our members deserve the best and we can justify the cost by the time and frustation we save administering the system.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Lack of online collaboration and file storage among our committees

initial_reviews.review_title: Engaging Members Made Easier
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The ability to have both a community and email marketing platform combine is very helpful! We need to look at our full communications cycle and by using Higher Logic Thrive you are able to capture how people are communicating on your communities and engaging in email then pull it together to give them a personalized experience. On the email automation side I also love that Thrive Marketing is robust but still easy to use. Other platforms are so robust that it's hard to do the basics but with Thrive Marketing you can do a lot through automated campaigns, engagement scoring, and audience segmenting while also being able to quickly get an email out the door.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Initial integration process, poor customer support, and glitchy.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automating email campaigns to save staff time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy transition and great customer support!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
It was a very easy transition from our old HL community to Thrive. Had a great transition team and have had wonderful support since. The Thrive community is easy to edit and having the Thrive marketing along with it is making my job much easier

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
When we made the switch Thrive membership was only for individuals. That has changed and I just found that out while at Super Forum. I am looking forward to some of the products that are coming out to continue to make the experience even better for our members.

initial_reviews.review_title: Love the continuous developments to the higher logic platform.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
What I like the best about Higher Logic is that the platform is built for associations. Having the neccessary tools and resources available to our team that help our society's marketing and community efforts allows us to focus on our plans without reinventing the wheel.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Sometimes I encounter bugs in the informz platform specifically when I'm working on an email. Examples include emails not saving resulting in lost progress and informz being unaccessible at random times of the work day.

One thing I would like to see is a slight UI update for informz to look more modern and less blocky.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
As we're preparing to launch Thrive to our community members, we're excited for our members to use the platform. The social media-like feed seems familiar and intuitive to what our various target audiences will be attracted to.

I've worked with Higher Logic for 9 years, implementing communities at 2 different associations. I'm not a highly technical person, and I love that the HL staff is ready and willing to jump in and help to ensure your implement is successful and to provide ongoing support. They exceed my expectations every time.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I honestly don't have much to share in terms of deficits. Every once in a while, and upgrade requires some implementation on our part. But I'd rather have innovation-induced work than no innovation.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
HL connects members from across diverse locations, experiences, and industries in a way associations struggle to achieve without the platform and the technology.

initial_reviews.review_title: Six Years In and Still Happy
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I've had nothing but a good experience with HL since we signed on. Set-up was a breeze. The system is very intuitive. The automation rules have saved me countless hours - no need to manually send out welcomes, thank yous, or a bunch of other simple emails. The HigherLogic User Group (HUG) has been a great resource to see what others are doing and crowdsource solutions to simple problems - and anything that's needed to be escalated with a support ticket has been resolved in a timely matter for me.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The price. HL is not an inexpensive product - especially depending on whether you want any of the add-ons. For small organizations/associations, this is a pretty significant investment.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
If you can afford it, it's worth the investment. The automation rules are gold.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
HL is solving a few main problems. Number one, the automation rules save me time from having to manually send out a ton of emails. Number two, the reports quickly provide a good gauge of the involvement over the listserv/discussion board. This way, I can have an idea of where to adapt some of our strategies. Number three, it's giving members a quick and easy way to interact with each other - increasing the likelihood of their renewal.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Community Features
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic has a lot of amazing features that help build member engagement. We especially love the ability to build microsites for each of our specialty groups. Our members also love the discussion board, event calendar, member directory, and member resource library features.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
One downside that I've run into is feeling like I need to contact support for items that I wish I could do myself. For example, mass updating the email preferences of our groups. I also wish the reports included more data and would go back further than a month at a time. It would be really nice to see our annual data in the reports.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
I would recommend hiring either an internal or external consultant.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We utilize Higher Logic's microsite feature to create personalized websites for each of our specialty groups. Higher Logic has a lot of different widget options available to help us personalize the websites and build member engagement. We use the discussion board to allow members to stay engaged with each other and leadership, even through their emails. The member resource library allows our members to share valuable documents and resources. And the member directory gives our members the ability to find each other and connect either through the website or their own email. We use the member directory feature for mentor/mentee searches too. The ability to give our members selective admin privileges also provides our volunteers the opportunity to make edits to their own websites.

initial_reviews.review_title: Effective tool for Member Engagement
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I admit I was skeptical about purchasing  Higher Logic Community because I was not sure the benefit would warrant the cost - staff convinced me to try it.  Within the first three months, I saw the value of the community, especially for the association board and committees, and began to see the potential for membership engagement.  About the same time, the pandemic hit!  The community platform was a lifeline for many of our members.  The opportunity to engage with each other on the platform was a valuable networking avenue, especially when our members were isolated and disconnected from each other.  Now that restrictions regarding work location and travel are being lifted, our members are still using the community at a high engagement rate.  The association membership has grown in the past two years. I attribute some of that growth to enhanced engagement through the community platform.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The search feature for past posts or conversations is cumbersome.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
The community platform has enhanced board and committee communication and productivity.  The community has quickly become perceived as a significant benefit of membership; thus, it has contributed to member recruitment and retention.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The setup is very intuitive and easy even for a non-coder. The support staff and the HUB community are efficient in answering any questions or resolving any issues. The community is also user-friendly for our diverse membership. I would highly recommend it to build a safe space for members to exchange and build relationships.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The polling tool could be a bit more elaborate. Currently the basic functions doesn't allow it's usage for a different variety of needs.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking to establish a safe space where our member community can network, exchange ideas, find solutions for their problems and have a sense of belonging. With the support of HL team, hard work, our member community's collaboration and time, we've managed to create this environment we were looking for our members.

initial_reviews.review_title: Non-Profit Executive Assistant
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I like the Email Delivery Management set-up, integration with OneDrive/SharePoint, permalink option for posts, refineable search tool for locating specific posts, attachments, users, etc., and the professional/clean appearance of email notifications when posts are made to communities.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I dislike the Library as I do not find it efficient (it takes too many clicks to upload, move, delete items) or intuitive, especially for new users. The Folder View is cleaner than the List View from an organiational perspective, but the Folder View feels dated and clumsy all the same. Also, I don't particularly appreciate that there is no way to export whole Discussion threads.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
HL Online Community has been very effective as a discussion platform and mass communication tool for the non-profit that I work for. It has not been as effective as a document storage/organization tool. I would recommend it as a communication platform but not as a primary document storage platform.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving the problem of having a secure space to store documents and host discussions for specific groups of people inside and outside the office. We rely on HL for mass communication with a large audience. Many productive and essential conversations have happened because of the Discussion threads on AFG Connects [Higher Logic].

initial_reviews.review_title: Higher Logic Does It All
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I really like the ease of use in editing pages and the content display options. There is also a wealth of information from the community and within the HL Academy (an invaluable resource).

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Some of the back-end site setup navigation is a little confusing, hard to remember where something is if I don't access it a lot. I wish the site admin and page edit areas were more intertwined or at least easier to jump between the two within the same page.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Ensure you have a dedicated community manager and IT personnel to assist in set-up and maintenance. It may seem obvious but many companies think existing personnel can take on this task when it really needs to have a dedicated team for it.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our Higher Logic community is helping our members connect in more specific and related ways. Members are getting more and more comfortable posting their common or rare questions as our community engagement grows. Two years ago we merged two companies, thus merging two different sets of agencies. This community has helped agency members get to know one another and feel more connected in a very remote world.

initial_reviews.review_title: Intuitive Software - Awesome Company Culture
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Tipping points for the Higher Logic online community were the user-friendly admin, the company's experience with NetForum integration. Higher Logic currently has no competitors in this space.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The downside to the Higher Logic online community is the one-way integration. It would be awesome to have two-way sync between it and our association management system - NetForum.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Our Higher Logic online community's setup was very straightforward. The integration and implementation teams were friendly, patient, and super supportive during its roll-out. I highly recomend taking advantage of Higher Logic's robust training academy. They offer free live instructor-led courses delivered via a Zoom meeting format-all attendees have a training sandbox environment to engage in hands-on exercises. Sandbox training helped me explore the product's capabilities and made me a confident administrator.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Higher Logic online community gives our members quick assess to each other's contact information. It also gives them an easy and intuitive platform on which to network and share industry information.

initial_reviews.review_title: A solid community product that's being continually improved
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The automation aspects of community management are powerful. The ability to dynamically build lists based on behavior and demographics then use those to run engagement campaigns elevates the community tool above a simple forum or social networking site or listserv.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The cost. I say that a little tongue-in-cheek, but the community product is not inexpensive. That said, you get a lot for your money, and Higher Logic isn't a company that nickels and dimes you after signing a contract.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our communities exist to bring together professional peer groups and allow them to ask and answer questions, share ideas, and exchange work samples. Our community members are not competitors, and they actively work to help each other. This was especially obvious during the early days of the pandemic when HR and finance people were helping each other understand and respond to new rules and requirements.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Senior Digital Product and Analytics Manager

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The Volunteer Manager product allowed us to launch our Volunteer Program broadly to our membership. We were finally able to have an open call for volunteers that allowed for a transparent volunteer application and approval process and streamlined efficiencies in our organization. We have found new volunteers that we never would have found before with our prior process. Our volunteer engagement has increased dramatically and our pipeline of leadership and volunteers is stronger than it has ever been!

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The Mentor Match platform did not serve our members well. You should learn how the platform works and see if your members will be motivated to use that product by self servicing. We use Volunteer Manager for our mentoring program and that has worked really well for managing our mentor match program internally.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We did not have a Volunteer Management program across our association until we launched Volunteer Manager. This allowed us to improve our process, following best practices for volunteer management, and improved efficiencies .

Our volunteer engagement has increased dramatically and our pipeline of leadership and volunteers is stronger than it has ever been!

all_reviews.review_title: Six Years In and Still Happy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I've had nothing but a good experience with HL since we signed on. Set-up was a breeze. The system is very intuitive. The automation rules have saved me countless hours - no need to manually send out welcomes, thank yous, or a bunch of other simple emails. The HigherLogic User Group (HUG) has been a great resource to see what others are doing and crowdsource solutions to simple problems - and anything that's needed to be escalated with a support ticket has been resolved in a timely matter for me.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The price. HL is not an inexpensive product - especially depending on whether you want any of the add-ons. For small organizations/associations, this is a pretty significant investment.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
If you can afford it, it's worth the investment. The automation rules are gold.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
HL is solving a few main problems. Number one, the automation rules save me time from having to manually send out a ton of emails. Number two, the reports quickly provide a good gauge of the involvement over the listserv/discussion board. This way, I can have an idea of where to adapt some of our strategies. Number three, it's giving members a quick and easy way to interact with each other - increasing the likelihood of their renewal.

The HigherLogic User Group (HUG) has been a great resource to see what others are doing and crowdsource solutions to simple problems - and anything that's needed to be escalated with a support ticket has been resolved in a timely matter for me.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic has a lot of amazing features that help build member engagement. We especially love the ability to build microsites for each of our specialty groups. Our members also love the discussion board, event calendar, member directory, and member resource library features.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
One downside that I've run into is feeling like I need to contact support for items that I wish I could do myself. For example, mass updating the email preferences of our groups. I also wish the reports included more data and would go back further than a month at a time. It would be really nice to see our annual data in the reports.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
I would recommend hiring either an internal or external consultant.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We utilize Higher Logic's microsite feature to create personalized websites for each of our specialty groups. Higher Logic has a lot of different widget options available to help us personalize the websites and build member engagement. We use the discussion board to allow members to stay engaged with each other and leadership, even through their emails. The member resource library allows our members to share valuable documents and resources. And the member directory gives our members the ability to find each other and connect either through the website or their own email. We use the member directory feature for mentor/mentee searches too. The ability to give our members selective admin privileges also provides our volunteers the opportunity to make edits to their own websites.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I admit I was skeptical about purchasing  Higher Logic Community because I was not sure the benefit would warrant the cost - staff convinced me to try it.  Within the first three months, I saw the value of the community, especially for the association board and committees, and began to see the potential for membership engagement.  About the same time, the pandemic hit!  The community platform was a lifeline for many of our members.  The opportunity to engage with each other on the platform was a valuable networking avenue, especially when our members were isolated and disconnected from each other.  Now that restrictions regarding work location and travel are being lifted, our members are still using the community at a high engagement rate.  The association membership has grown in the past two years. I attribute some of that growth to enhanced engagement through the community platform.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The search feature for past posts or conversations is cumbersome.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
The community platform has enhanced board and committee communication and productivity.  The community has quickly become perceived as a significant benefit of membership; thus, it has contributed to member recruitment and retention.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
review_question_answers.answer: I admit I was skeptical about purchasing  Higher Logic Community because I was not sure the benefit would warrant the cost - staff convinced me to try it.  Within the first three months, I saw the value of the community, especially for the association board and committees, and began to see the potential for membership engagement.  About the same time, the pandemic hit!  The community platform was a lifeline for many of our members.  The opportunity to engage with each other on the platform was a valuable networking avenue, especially when our members were isolated and disconnected from each other.  Now that restrictions regarding work location and travel are being lifted, our members are still using the community at a high engagement rate.  The association membership has grown in the past two years. I attribute some of that growth to enhanced engagement through the community platform.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I like the Email Delivery Management set-up, integration with OneDrive/SharePoint, permalink option for posts, refineable search tool for locating specific posts, attachments, users, etc., and the professional/clean appearance of email notifications when posts are made to communities.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I dislike the Library as I do not find it efficient (it takes too many clicks to upload, move, delete items) or intuitive, especially for new users. The Folder View is cleaner than the List View from an organiational perspective, but the Folder View feels dated and clumsy all the same. Also, I don't particularly appreciate that there is no way to export whole Discussion threads.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
HL Online Community has been very effective as a discussion platform and mass communication tool for the non-profit that I work for. It has not been as effective as a document storage/organization tool. I would recommend it as a communication platform but not as a primary document storage platform.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving the problem of having a secure space to store documents and host discussions for specific groups of people inside and outside the office. We rely on HL for mass communication with a large audience. Many productive and essential conversations have happened because of the Discussion threads on AFG Connects [Higher Logic].

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I really like the ease of use in editing pages and the content display options. There is also a wealth of information from the community and within the HL Academy (an invaluable resource).

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Some of the back-end site setup navigation is a little confusing, hard to remember where something is if I don't access it a lot. I wish the site admin and page edit areas were more intertwined or at least easier to jump between the two within the same page.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Ensure you have a dedicated community manager and IT personnel to assist in set-up and maintenance. It may seem obvious but many companies think existing personnel can take on this task when it really needs to have a dedicated team for it.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our Higher Logic community is helping our members connect in more specific and related ways. Members are getting more and more comfortable posting their common or rare questions as our community engagement grows. Two years ago we merged two companies, thus merging two different sets of agencies. This community has helped agency members get to know one another and feel more connected in a very remote world.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Tipping points for the Higher Logic online community were the user-friendly admin, the company's experience with NetForum integration. Higher Logic currently has no competitors in this space.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The downside to the Higher Logic online community is the one-way integration. It would be awesome to have two-way sync between it and our association management system - NetForum.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Our Higher Logic online community's setup was very straightforward. The integration and implementation teams were friendly, patient, and super supportive during its roll-out. I highly recomend taking advantage of Higher Logic's robust training academy. They offer free live instructor-led courses delivered via a Zoom meeting format-all attendees have a training sandbox environment to engage in hands-on exercises. Sandbox training helped me explore the product's capabilities and made me a confident administrator.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Higher Logic online community gives our members quick assess to each other's contact information. It also gives them an easy and intuitive platform on which to network and share industry information.

all_reviews.review_title: A solid community product that's being continually improved
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The automation aspects of community management are powerful. The ability to dynamically build lists based on behavior and demographics then use those to run engagement campaigns elevates the community tool above a simple forum or social networking site or listserv.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The cost. I say that a little tongue-in-cheek, but the community product is not inexpensive. That said, you get a lot for your money, and Higher Logic isn't a company that nickels and dimes you after signing a contract.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our communities exist to bring together professional peer groups and allow them to ask and answer questions, share ideas, and exchange work samples. Our community members are not competitors, and they actively work to help each other. This was especially obvious during the early days of the pandemic when HR and finance people were helping each other understand and respond to new rules and requirements.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Senior Digital Product and Analytics Manager

all_reviews.review_content:

I love that the online community provides a central place for members to connect with one another in this virtual world we all live in. This allows us to provide a networking opportunity that many other organizations don't have.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The reporting interface for Higher Logic's Online Community isn't the most user-friendly to read or easy to navigate. I find myself often submitting support tickets seeking help in finding the data I need.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Consider investing time and energy into improving the reporting function. Focus group users to gain feedback as to what we want and what we need.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problem that the Online Community solves for us is our member's desire to connect with like-minded peers. This has become a popular member benefit and a new way to reach those that were previously not engaged.

all_reviews.review_title: A Wealth of Information and Best Practices
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
HL has so many resources, libraries, communities, and educational events that make it easy to get the information needed. Plus their support team is very fast and so helpful.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Although all of the resources are amazing, sometimes it can be slightly overwhelming to find exactly what I want.  When that is the case I usually reach out to our contact and they always point me in the right direction :)

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Be proactive - HL is a wealth of information of how to use their software and best practice for community success.  Use their resources, attend their webinars, get involved!

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
The HL communities allow me to connect with others who also have a Mentor Program so we can share best practices, tips, and resources on what has worked best for us.

all_reviews.review_title: Our Higher Logic Platform changed the culture of our organization
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I like the engagement we see from our members sharing information, asking questions and helping each other, while getting to know each other better. It's easy to use for all ages.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There is nothing I dislike about the platform, everything functions well and it has several themes you can choose from to customize so that your platform represents your organization, your logo colors, etc.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
I recommend using the platform for all of your volunteer groups (if applicable) - committees, task forces, workgroups, etc. It is very functional and the notifications (and ability to regulate the frequency) are extremely helpful as well.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are increasing our member engagement and participation. Building deeper relationships and changing our culture to one of caring and helping, creating a more welcoming and inclusive environment across our organization.

all_reviews.review_title: The support you need for building an online community
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The platform contains what we need to connect our community members in an easy-to-access, friendly way for the user, which was our ultimate goal. Tools for automating processes and creating reports are detailed and help provide the information we need behind the scenes. We've been able to personalize the feel and experience. Most of all, the support has been excellent, and we can't say enough about our key team members who led us through the process. Thank you!

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
If there is one thing I would change, it would be for the announcements to show up in the user's daily digest even if there is no discussion thread activity on that day.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a national society and needed to connect our members so that they could easily find each other and discuss important topics. We also have committees that need private areas to connect and do work. The online community makes it convenient for them to network and collaborate on their own time.

all_reviews.review_content:

The customer service is fantastic! Quick responses and always helpful. Even if what I want done is not possible. I appreciated them trying. A but pricy for value but still good for what it is.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The inability to connect the volunteer portal with the online community. The document library and the new mobile app need some work. The price is high compared to competitors.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
I am lucky that I have a graphic designer who has been able to tailor our site in ways many cannot. I was also very lucky to have a wonderful HL implementation manager who unfortunately is no longer with the company but helped tremendously when we put the site together. It's a great product but pricey. It beats out its competitors because of the document library.

all_reviews.review_content:

Discussion & thread capabilities, staff at Higher Logic cares about clients' success, client user group to help gather peer-solutions to common association/company questions, lots of associate modules including websites/events/library, multiple vendors/partners that work on the software, works with a lot of AMS/CRM/LMS vendors with SSO options, does crowdsource improvement ideas, events focused on improving client knowledge of the platform, the admin's backend has data queries and email automation, flexible customization of website & webpages, flexible widgets to allow for customization of community content, admin access of communities for our volunteers and junior staff

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Allowing users to be able to network and ask questions of their peers online, replaced our website totally to have a more interactive website and digital presence, help engage our members at a deeper level

all_reviews.review_title: Intuitive, Easy-to-Use, and Excellent User Support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The Higher Logic online community platform works.  It's an excellent way for the association space to enable members to create digital communities.  The Higher Logic User Group is a community for Higher Logic admins to ask and answer questions about the platform.  Higher Logic Academy trains admins on how to use the platform in a strategic way.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Ideas that are proposed by users must be upvoted to be implemented.  It can be difficult to get enough people to vote for quick fixes that seem like low hanging fruit.  The good news is HL continually improves the platform.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?

all_reviews.review_title: Higher Logic Communities Making Engagement Simpler
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
We implemented Higher Logic Communities nearly two years ago and it has been such an effective tool for our association. We used to have various "forums" methods, but they were messy and clunky. I love this platform because it gives our members one spot to interact, share resources, find leadership information, and more. It has really streamlined our process.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There isn't anything I don't particularly dislike about the product. The key is getting your members to understand how easy it is to use.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
When launching Higher Logic Communities, don't feel pressured to do all the things. Start small! Create a few Communities where you can get engagement and involvement, and it will be easier to roll out subsequent Communities.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used to have clunky member connection/communication. Our old forums were listserv style, so you never saw the conversation string, just one reply. This platform allows for well-rounded discussion and involvement.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful Email Automation with a Bit of Learning Curve
all_reviews.review_content:

Higher Logic MA allows for easy targeting based on interests, user activity, member type and other demographic information. It is much easier and more in-depth than MailChimp, which is what we used previously. The templates are great, MUCH better than creating email templates in iMIS.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
We are using the new integration with iMIS Cloud, and it doesn't automatically pull all of the user fields. Also, the IQAs take about 2hrs to synch, which usually means we just use the import/export tool for new interst groups. The reporting detail is good, but has a lot of steps. Would like to see the interface a bit more slick.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Push your sales rep to show you demos and be very specific about you can replicate and improve your current processes.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being more specific with our target audience, tracking analytics, automating emails, and improving our deliverability.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
We use HigherLogic for both our website and our community.  For our website, I like the BootStrap framework, because it is so responsive, mobile-friendly and open-source.  For our community, I like that they help us to increase engagement, set community goals, and have so many features that are what we need!  We also have single sign-on integration with our AMS, so our members find it SUPER convenient to only have one username and one password for all things relating to our association.  Also, I just have to say a positive word about the HigherLogic Support team.  I have never known software support people who responded so quickly and were so knowledgeable, and the knowledge extends not only to HigherLogic software but also to how it might interact with other systems (like AMS or email management), how browsers or versions might affect HigherLogic, etc.  VERY HELPFUL!!.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I have to be honest and say there's not much I dislike at all.  One possible improvement would be if reports were more "configurable" (meaning that I set up reports I want, rather than having to choose from a list of ones that are pre-made).  Honestly that's not really much of a dislike, though, because they have made so many reports in so many ways that I'm able to find what I want to track.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
I would recommend that you follow their suggested best practices and suggestions for implementation.  The implementation team is fantastic and they will help you launch the software for the best possible results.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our association is national, so it's difficult for our members to feel like they are "connected" to anything--an organization or each other.  HigherLogic solved that issue 100%.  In addition, it brought our website into the 21st century so we are mobile-friendly and responsive to any device (desktop, tablet or cell).  Our membership is growing steadily, our engagement is increasing steadily as our members understand how to use the communities, and views to our page are continuing to increase steadily...after using HigherLogic for years!

all_reviews.review_title: An online community system that delivers in features and service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic manages to offer the features that you want in an online community platform, but without gumming it up with extra modules that add little. Plus, they back up the platform with fantastic educational tools and support functions. Have been a customer for more than five years now and they continue to make incremental improvements that make it a more sturdy product while also adding new features that deliver larger leaps in performance.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Reporting functionality continues to move in the direction I like, but it could still be easier to grab data in a hurry.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
When launching, listen to the advice that they have to provide and test their process. If something doesn't sound right for your association/company, explain the situation and see if they have a fall-back idea.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed to find a way to get more individuals involved with our association. By launching a Higher Logic online community we took down a lot of walls and got more people effectively engaged.

all_reviews.review_title: Great product to connect with your members
Higher Logic - an invaluable partner for ACF
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
It's a powerful tool that engages our Members in a user-friendly way. In the nine months since its launch, our online community has provided a valuable place for Members to gather, connect and collaborate. During the pandemic, this has been critically important, and we expect it to become ACF's top-rated benefit in a matter of time and remain heavilty utilized well into the future.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The learning curve. . . that said, as with any technology/platform, there is learning that is needed to utilize it fully.  This isn't so much a negative as a reality. Once we made the strategic decision to invest in our Members by providing Higher Logic's online community, it was understood there would be lots to learn. Given this, the investment has paid off and continues to pay off.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
There are several problems that the online community has done for us: 1) it's increased our value proposition, thereby helping our recruitment and retention efforts, 2) it's demonstrated to Members we care about their experience while encouraging them to connect with other members, 3) it's brought sub-groups within our overall membership closer together (i.e., Chapter Presidents), 4) it's provided our leadership an essential and "real-time" source of feedback from Members and 5) it's increased our desire to communicate more effectively and with more transparency than we had in the past.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The ease of use for our members. We transferred from another platform that had been in place for over 5 years. In less than 3 years we have 2 individual groups who have exceeded the engagement of the other platform overall. Our members state that the community is one of the top member benefits we offer!

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Arrgh!! Reports!! I always feel like I am learning where I need to go to get specific information. There are also tasks I don't use often that I have to go back and review the How-To in order to remember the steps.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
This is a mid-level price community platform. Well worth the investment in terms of support and application.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are creating Communities of Practice! We have done a few beta tests, and are getting ready to launch this new area of use in the coming 6 months. Very exciting! We also have used Community as an event platform very successfully. We are also using the community to support products and to share resources with our members. The biggest use is to connect our members with each other.

For our small marketing team, we were looking for a solution that would take us beyond the upload a list and send it out capabilities that our previous email provider offered. We were spinning our wheels creating and uploading lists rather than taking advantage of a solution that was fully integrated with our AMS. This product solved that problem with auto-updating, integrating list building capabilities - as well as plethora of other data points about our users that could allow us to target our messages in a more effective manner.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We solved the problem of not using the most up-to-minute data for our email marketing. We have now benefitted from further integration with the Higher Logic community platform to give us even more insight on our users and how they are behaving across all of our platforms.

What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Having available support and resources has been the most helpful. A major upside has been the integration of everything in one. For example, it's very convenient to have marketing automation and the communities under one roof.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The look of the platform is a bit outdated. I would like to see a more modern feel and the integration of social media that makes it easier to pull and share things outside of the community.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
So far the online community has helped us with committee management and programming such as MentorMatch. The automation rules have also helped us with our new member onboarding process and communications

all_reviews.review_title: Long time customer and very happy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic offers a high degree of customization of the platform. They are also industry leading when it comes the the automation capabilities - it allows a community team to create really hand-on realtionship building at scale.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There are some modern features that have come to be "expected" across all tools that higher logic is missing: For example, threaded direct messages are not available.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using the platform to support goals around customer life time value, brand recognition, brand sentiment, customer engagement, customer loyalty.

all_reviews.review_title: Super configurable application for online communities fits many use cases
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The Higher Logic platform is super configurable. You can take a barebones forum and upgrade it to what looks like a completely custom solution. I really appreciate the ability to add components as the community matures. It's a good idea to have a strategy from the beginning, of course, but it's convenient that the platform can grow with your community. It also has a nice suite of reports built in.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The back end isn't the most intuitive, and it's really easy to forget where particular features live. All in all it's a minor complaint, and over the four years I've been using Higher Logic, it has been updated and improved some.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used a different platform for community before migrating to Higher Logic, and the biggest reason for the switch was configurability. We use the community primary for technical support, and the software we support is very technical, so we need ways for customers to share files with us, privately message us and each other, access gated document libraries, etc. We have been able to create a more granular permissioning scheme which allows us to serve the community users more efficiently. We've found we can use the community for more than information dissemination and Q&A.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Company to work with and great system for our members
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The program evolves as our needs increase.  Higher Logic is constantly looking for ways to improve their product and increase customer satisfaction.  We are one of their smaller clients and yet they always treat us like we are their most important client.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There really isn't any part of Higher Logic that I dislike.  The system runs smoothly, they have the best customer support department I have ever worked with and they check in with us periodically just to make sure we are running smoothly.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
BE prepared to devote staff and time to the initial set up and marketing to your members.  It took us a while to change member culture on social sites but the rewards have been worth the initial effort.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since we are a trade association that deals with Hospitals, doctors and nurses we have to be concerned with security and HIPAA regulations.  Higher Logic has always provided this type of security for us.  It has given our members a place to go and work out industry issues and help improve their safety and day to day operations concerns.

all_reviews.review_title: Awesome Platform for engaging your customers through personalization through Automation Rules
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
If Higher Logic hasn't told you about automation rules, then you need to ask. This is what sets them apart from the competition. You can do a thousand things with automation rules. Some of the things I am using it for is to personalize the customer experience.  For example, we have a product support community, and have many products. I can setup automation rules to say, "if a customers has this product, show this blog to them when they log in". Another example is that you can send emails directly to customers that haven't logged in for X number of days. Or ask customers to fill out certain parts of their profile. It really is endless and fairly simple to do.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I guess in any platform for community  you can find things that are not great. We are a global company and it would be great to have language resources. I think in the Tech space it is super important. Being able to have a Japanese or German community in that language would help set us apart from the competition. I keep asking them about it, but for now, it's still on on their roadmap.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Higher logic as a fairly robust API. I have have connected the platform to SSO, SFDC and to other technologies. This will help us to solve the problem of customer experience.  My goal is to setup a "One-stop-shop" so that that customers can get their information quickly in a digital way. We are also starting to solve the case deflection issue and retention issue. Higher Logic is helping us do that.

all_reviews.review_title: Integrated tools to better align your tech stack and streamline your customer/member experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I love how easily Higher Logic integrates with our association management system (NetFORUM Enterprise) and streamlines our member and prospective-member experiences. As a marketer and communicator, the conversion and engagement tracking provide actionable insight and clear-cut ROI that helps us justify our budgeting and projection time allocation.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
We've had some of the issues you'd expect whenever you try to integrate new Sass into your operation, but Higher Logic's project managers and engagement teams have helped us easily remedy those issues.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Determine how easy it'll be to fold Higher Logic into your current processes (and how Higher Logic can potentially change some of your processes to be more streamlined), determine how easy it'll be to integrate your CRM.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
All-in-one lead generation; drip, onboarding, and conversion email campaigns, community engagement; officer communications

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The mailing designer 2 templates are "responsive" so that you don't have to hand-code both desktop and mobile versions. There are a decent amount of options for components and you can create your own reusable components on a per template basis. They recently rolled out an open html component so you can do some coding without having to create a full html email which has been nice.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I would like reusable/custom components (layouts) to be available across all templates.
Customer service response time is slow and they've introduced bugs when "upgrading" that have gone unresolved for several days quite a few times.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Integration with our AMS is helpful to create more personalized and segmented email marketing.

all_reviews.review_title: Good product, great service, can't set it and forget it
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
HigherLogic is great accross the board. They build produts to last with the client in mind. In my expereince once you're onboarded you'll never want to leave or need anything else. Have an idea that would make their product better? Tell them and they'll actually work on it. Seriously. This brings me to their client support and customer service. 110% This is where HigherLogic really shines. Once you sign your contract you are cared for. Once you complete onboarding you are still cared for. Been a client for awhile? They are still there to care for you. They want you to love the product, use the product and improve your business with the product.

I'm fairly techsavvy and went through onboarding smoothly so my HigherLogic rep would comes to our meetings with creative ideas to help our strategic goals. Not only are they helping us get the most bang for our buck and find success with their products, but they're also making me look good in brainstorming sessions!

Down to the details: Are you the first person to have some weird ask? They will find the right person to get you the right answer. No question is left unanswered and they offer multiple training methods for those that don't want their handheld. You have the option for in-person training (in non-COVD times), online training, group sessions, one-on-one training, videos and written trainings. Everything is customized to your business and your needs.

My company is pretty unique in our membership style and goals. The HigherLogci team went above and beyond to make sure the Community fulfilled out needs. We have greatly increased our member engagement and we can track in great detail where we've had success and who we still need to engage. Higher Logic's products are easy to use, helpful to the user and very VERY detailed. You can track EVERYTHING. We have loved having so much data to influence our decisionmaking and prove the ROI behind using HigherLogic.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Onboarding is a little too timeconsuming. If you have someone at your company who will be fully dedicated to learning how to use HigherLogic and managing everything, then you should sign-up without hesitation. If you don't have an employee to dedicate to this software, then the HigherLogic team will help you make the time and support you where needed, but it will take time. You'll need to make time for the trainings to get the most out of these products. The ROI will come without doubt, but you can't just wingit. You actually need to spend an hour a week or more on learning the product for a few months.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's been a long time goal for us to increasae our industry engagement and communicate our efforts with non-members. The Higher Logic Online Community allowed us to connect with our members, build a network of industry contacts through our members and other outreach, learn what content they care about and keep them engaged.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic combines simple CMS tools with oodles of data-driven content personalization capabilities. The possibilities are limitless for crafting a smart-relevant online community experience. Smart, savvy people, too!

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic is maturing! Their reporting is very limited with no in-product report writer. Existing reports are confusing and inconsistent for what appears to be the same metric across reports. The And/Or Boolean logic in the Automation Rules also has its challenges -- requiring sometimes 2-3 separate rules to pare down to one segmentation. However, the team is always eager to help and you can truly accomplish most any segmentation with the occasional extra rule. They'll grow to overcome these growing pains. I still highly recommend the team and the solution.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Higher Logic allowed my previous employer to reinvent and reinvigorate our previous online community -- with new features, new usability, and a new interface. This allowed customers with a combination of up to 25 potential products to find product news, submit product ideas, and engage with Support tools and knowledge base resources in a targeted, relevant experience -- all in addition to the core peer-to-peer community functionality.

all_reviews.review_title: Effective as a platform with room to grow
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The discussion functionality is mature. The blogging platform is also mature. It provides a flexible secure way to communicate with both customers and the public.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The gamification and advocacy modules could both be matured. Ideation is not gamified. Ideation does not notify. There is room for the platform to mature and grow.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Know what you really want to do with your community and be able to place the things HL does well first in your implementation and in your roll out. The Volunteer/Advocacy module is more foundation/organization focused and needs customization to be more corporate-centric; it is also quite manual. Be ready to be engage with the product as much as with your community.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Collecting product ideas from our community, Q/A with customers and troubleshooting of broader issues, creation of an advocacy platform in which we can highlight and reward those who are advocates of our products.

review_question_answers.answer: The discussion functionality is mature. The blogging platform is also mature. It provides a flexible secure way to communicate with both customers and the public.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
review_question_answers.answer: The gamification and advocacy modules could both be matured. Ideation is not gamified. Ideation does not notify. There is room for the platform to mature and grow.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
review_question_answers.answer: Know what you really want to do with your community and be able to place the things HL does well first in your implementation and in your roll out. The Volunteer/Advocacy module is more foundation/organization focused and needs customization to be more corporate-centric; it is also quite manual. Be ready to be engage with the product as much as with your community.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Collecting product ideas from our community, Q/A with customers and troubleshooting of broader issues, creation of an advocacy platform in which we can highlight and reward those who are advocates of our products.

all_reviews.review_title: Higher logic Marketing es un excelente producto
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Podemos segmentar nuestros mercados para diversas campanas y, a traves de la analitica en Real Magnet, podemos hacer un seguimiento de las personas mas interesadas en la capacitacion, el servicio o el producto que brindamos. Tambien me encantan los informes mensuales que podemos ejecutar con respecto a nuestras actividades y la capacidad de identificar cuentas a las que se deben cobrar las promociones. La atencion al cliente es increible. Una caracteristica muy excelente es que podemos contactar a nuestros miembros con HTML, texto y dispositivos moviles: nuestras aperturas de dispositivos moviles han aumentado al 35% de nuestros miembros.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Me gustaria ver una mejor manera de organizar nuestras listas; es posible que esto ya este disponible y que no sea consciente de ello. Tambien encuentro que a veces no puedo lograr que los estilos y tamanos de letra coincidan y el formateo puede ser un poco dificil en algun momento. Estos son, sin embargo, en mi opinion, problemas menores. La parte de la encuesta para informar es un poco engorrosa, pero viable.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Integrar el producto con su AMS es seguramente el preferido utilizado con magnetmail, todavia no lo hemos integrado, pero lo mas probable es que se dirijan en esa direccion

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Podemos enviar correos electronicos a las personas que realmente desean nuestra informacion en lugar de hacer masa para todos, y aquellos que desean salir de una lista en particular pueden darse de baja y permanecer fuera de la lista para futuros correos electronicos. Los beneficios son menos costos para enviar correos electronicos a los miembros y clientes mas satisfechos.

We've been on board with Higher Logic for 3 years now. I feel like it has just continued to improve and grow every year. I'm excited to continue expanding our use of all the Higher Logic software. The staff/support is extremely responsive, and wants to make this a great experience for all their customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Higher logic Magnet Mail has the simplest User Interface for the marketers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Magnet Mail Social is very simple and easy to use. New users quickly adapt to this tool and can use the user interface to build journeys, campaigns and forms/landing pages. The help text or info in each option explains the user about it's usage and guide them through the set up process without knowledge of HTML, javascript or other database languages which many marketing tool require.
Link labels is something we widely use along with tags.
Managing suppression rules also can be customized easily based on campaign type.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The contact or subscriber management does not provide 360 view of engagement like other marketing tools and we often have to contact support for complex reporting data/queries.
For organization that need complex custom reporting and require heavy integration with CRM, Real Magnet have very limited options. Very limited information (contact/lead or campaign) can be passed from Real magnet to Salesforce CRM for us.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email Marketing, Social Marketing, Lead capture, Customer Journeys and  landing pages.
Subscription management, tracking data and analytics etc.
