all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic's platform has allowed us to connect our members to each other in a way we couldn't before. We host numerous virtual events each month, and local meetings each quarter but were missing the day-to-day connections. Since implementing HL, our discussion forums consistently rank in the top 3 benefits during our annual NPS survey and the qualitative feedback from members who have found solutions to their problems through the forums is astounding.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There are some real-time notifications we'd like to see implemented, such as a notification if someone responds to a question you posted or the ability to follow a thread. Overall, we consistently see 25+ posts in each daily digest so we have good engagement, but those features are ones our members request from us and we believe would further our participation in the forums.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
As an international association which provides education and services to our members mostly online, the personal connection our members are making through the platform has been extremely beneficial. It's created a sense of community, and helped drive attendance to our annual conference (an in-person event) as an opportunity to network with those you've been interacting with virtually all year.

all_reviews.review_title: Transitioning from Zimbra to Higher Logic
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
We had already a successful community where everything that organically could be done for success it had been done. But, from a technological point of view, there was a lot of room for growth. That's when we decided that we needed a platform that could bring us from GOOD to GREAT. We haven't re-launched yet, but we are few weeks away from our re-launch date, and so far Higher Logic has provided the best customer service, technical support, professional community manager consulting, and thorough training.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
We are coming from a platform that has a lot of possible customization, while Higher Logic offers an out-of-the box product. This is not a weakness for us, but it gives us confidence in a well working product.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
ROI tracking. Less time consuming manual activities, more automatized and efficient campaigns for scalable results.

all_reviews.review_title: Real Magnet is delivering real results
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Real Magnet has a simple and streamlined approach when it comes to email, social media, and automation.   RM has the best customer support of any ESP I've used.  Our account manager Mike is always there to help and has a genuine interest in our success.  Automation and Real Magnet's integration with our database netFORUM is changing the way we approach email marketing.  Automation in the past was something only for companies with large staffs and dedicated expertise.  If you're an association looking to automate renewals and welcome series for the first time, set-up a demo with Real Magnet.   I've used other automation systems that are overly cumbersome and complex, taking hours to set-up the most basic automation program (I personal blame this type of software for the low saturation of automation in the association world).   Real Magnet's approach makes the process as simple as possible and really takes away any fears of setting up your first automation program.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Every ESP has its own unique quirks, but nothing to complain about.  I do have to give their staff props for always listening to users' feedback and constantly improving the system and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Set-up a sales call, their staff is extremely helpful and genuinely interested in providing custom solutions to take your email marketing and automation to the next level.  We personally worked with Dennis and he was great.  We looked at multiple email providers and Real Magnet fit our current needs the best.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were using multiple email providers before. Real Magnet has allowed us to consolidate all our unique email requirements into one system and, more importantly, record all information back into our database, netFORUM, so that it remains our database of record.  Automation is at its core and we've been able to leverage RM for renewals and a welcome series (including automating the corresponding print pieces).  Other benefits include responsive emails, preference center, A/B testing, user behavior tracking, social media management, and much more.

Right from the beginning the customer service is always been wonderful. They are prompt responsive and I usually get back to me within an hour during normal working days. The system is very easy to use, very intuitive and easy to understand where you need to go to find what you need to build an email.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The one thing I do not like about informs is that you pay per email. Rather than paying a flat monthly fee I pay for every email that I send out. This intern has made me segment more of my emails to target them better, but it also reduces my reach of messaging as I'm trying to control how much I send out.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Informs is good for someone who has experience with email marketing. While the advisers are great to work with you do need general knowledge of best practices and knowing how to set up your own templates and manipulate them is very helpful.

all_reviews.review_title: Director of Content and Digital Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Informz is a great platform with limitless customization for emails. It allows user unprecedented access to html when setting up templates and emails, which allows for customization and ease of use. There isn't anything you can't create in informz due to this.

The send features are really robust as well. From email subject line testing, to sending to recipients based on when they routinely open emails, you can customize your sending preferences as well.

The reports are clear and concise and easy to understand. They have data heavy view options which can export to Excel, and a visual version at a glance.

You can also create automated campaigns, that auto send emails based on user actions, which can be a great tool.

You can literally do pretty much anything you can think of with Informz.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
With all the features comes a bit of complication. Although you can use a visual editor, etc to make and send emails, I would recommend Informz to more technologically inclined marketers. Like any email system it has it's own quirks, and it takes a few rounds of sending emails before you get adjusted to the system. Overall, I  don't really have anything I "dislike" about Informz.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
If you are serious about your email marketing I would highly recommend Informz to any business that wants to take their email marketing to the next level.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a membership based organization and Informz has helped us segment our customers and build customized/automated campaigns to attract new members. Their team is great to work with. Greg offers excellent customer service and even recommends new strategies when trying to accomplish goals. I highly recommend using their team to build email templates and work with them on creating automated campaigns.  With Greg's help, we have completely rebranded our email campaign and are starting to see the results!

all_reviews.review_title: Great Email Marketing Product for a Small Business, an Association or a LArge Team Based Company
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
We appreciate the response time by the team, the ability to automate emails easily and the ease with which we can create emails on a template. The tool is a great all around tool to build branding and send messages out to our members.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Some of the tools for organizing files can be a bit cumbersome. In particular managing images and the image gallery in the way we use it is not user friendly, causing us to often just upload an image again rather than find where it is already hosted on Real Magnet's Servers.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
We have been using Real Magnet for 8+ years for all our Association emails that we send out to members and we have had a great experience. The deliverability is great. They are constantly improving the product and offering new services to make our lives easier and if there is ever an issue or a change we need to have made, they are responsive. We do not use the automated features and links to our AMS, but the upload tool is easy to keep lists up to date for all our email needs. Having attended one of their conferences, I can say they are a great team of people that put a lot into the product and are excited about things down the pipeline. I would recommend using Real Magnet for your business/association.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our association is solving the problem of communication with our members. Real Magnet allows us to easily send a well formatted, graphical message to all our members with the click of a button and measure opens and clicks. This makes managing who to send messages to and confirming it was sent a breeze. We can also have multiple people able to send emails on behalf of the entire association.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The ability to completely customize our member community landing page, which we do with banner ads for upcoming in-person and virtual events. The clear layout makes navigating easy, even for the first time user. The Member Forum is another great tool for member engagement, again found right on our landing page. This forum allows our 7300+ members to engage with each other, no matter their chapter affiliation.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There are two things that I would say are issues being worked on, so I can't say I outright dislike them :-) First, the ability to nest communities in a parent/child or grandparent/parent/child configuration. Many of our chapters have associated communities, and each has a board community. It would be a much cleaner organizational structure to have nesting capabilities. And, with numerous leaders belonging to numerous communities (committees) within their chapter, this would help the volunteer manage their communities a bit better. The second thing is a Google docs-like functionality to be able to jointly edit a working document. Currently the system only allows a static storage, and no ability to edit for a group with associated permissions.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Cloud solution for our chapters - 100%. This is a huge value proposition for our volunteer leaders who serve one year terms, and succession planning and other resource documents for these leaders not being trapped on individual computers any more. A big win!

all_reviews.review_title: Makes managing membership and building websites so much easier
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The Higher Logic platform has served as a great benefit to our members in the last few years. The platform integrates smoothly with our AMS, has plenty of great features to facilitate member interaction, and since moving to the Bootstrap framework, has made building and managing websites so much easier. Not only a great product to work with, but also a great company to work with, Higher Logic is miles above the rest in its customer service. The sites almost always move smoothly, but if there are kinks or if we have questions, the technical support team is readily available to assist. They also maintain client forums, on-site training activities, and a great annual conference to help members make the most of their platform.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There is a slight learning curve for members. It takes some time to teach members how to navigate the various features of the site (profile, communities, etc.).

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Know your members: do your members interact frequently (or would they interact frequently, if given the opportunity)? If so, the HL may be of great value. You will have to educate your members how to use the site, and maybe encourage early adopters, but your members will be the ones to determine whether it meets their needs.

Also - you can build customized sites in Higher Logic fairly easily. The Bootstrap framework requires little knowledge beyond HTML and CSS, and there are a host of resources available online to help.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Collaboration is important in our field, and we wanted to encourage our broad membership base to interact and learn from each other. We were also looking for a cost-effective way to build and manage our sites. We've been able to do this all in one platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
review_question_answers.answer: The Higher Logic platform has served as a great benefit to our members in the last few years. The platform integrates smoothly with our AMS, has plenty of great features to facilitate member interaction, and since moving to the Bootstrap framework, has made building and managing websites so much easier. Not only a great product to work with, but also a great company to work with, Higher Logic is miles above the rest in its customer service. The sites almost always move smoothly, but if there are kinks or if we have questions, the technical support team is readily available to assist. They also maintain client forums, on-site training activities, and a great annual conference to help members make the most of their platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
review_question_answers.answer: There is a slight learning curve for members. It takes some time to teach members how to navigate the various features of the site (profile, communities, etc.).

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
review_question_answers.answer:
Know your members: do your members interact frequently (or would they interact frequently, if given the opportunity)? If so, the HL may be of great value. You will have to educate your members how to use the site, and maybe encourage early adopters, but your members will be the ones to determine whether it meets their needs.

all_reviews.review_title: The Higher Logic Platform is great!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
We love the flexibility of the CMS.  It's very user friendly and we can customize our site as needed.  We have the ability to create microsites as needed, and the WYSIWYG editor is by far the most user friendly CMS we've used.  It provides us the ability to own our website and update content quickly and frequently.  It's a great alternative to the custom CMS we have used before.  Our members also love the app - they like having access to information, primarily the directory, on the go.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The need work w/ a 3rd party for web design.  We would have preferred to work with Higher Logic from start to finish, but we needed design work down.  It wasn't a hard process, but we enjoy working with Higher Logic directly and it would keep most of our website under one umbrella.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Higher Logic is great to work with!  I would recommend you consider their solutions for both member communities and website hosting.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We love the Higher Logic platform.  It's opened so many doors for our members by using the communities, as well as the app.  Member LOVE the directory available from the app.  From a staff perspective, we love the CMS.  It's given us the flexibility to create a dynamic website that is constantly changing.  We can leverage tools already available within the community, and use them to better serve our membership.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Director, Member Relations and Administrative Services

all_reviews.review_title: The best email marketing solution for associations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Informz is easily the best email marketing solution for associations. Informz offers database integrations, making it easy to 'pull' personalized information into your marketing messages and drill down to your best target audience. I utilize most informz features in my current role, but I like the campaign designer the best. Don't even get me started on the template gallery -- what a wonderful FREE resource! Customer services is top notch -- not automated ticket system here -- but rather a real person who is passionate about making your email marketing the best it can be. These are some of the reasons I continue to recommend informz to my employers.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There isn't much about Informz that I dislike. One area for improvement would be the timing of various features getting "turned on" in an account. I find that in talking to my emarketing advisor we often find solutions to problems that could have been fixed with a feature thats hiding somewhere in my account. With a flip of a switch, the feature is turned on and the problem is resolved.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated messaging and campaigns have taken my associations tired marketing strategies and revitalized them. We've been able to identify and send messages based on more than just a job title, but rather a members "persona". We've drastically reduced the amount of marketing emails sent, while improving our registration and conversions on nearly all products. We have official eliminated the "send-to-all" mentality.

all_reviews.review_title: Informz has taken our marketing to the next level
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
What do you like best?
The integration of our account management software with to an easy to use platform. Their dedicated eMarketing advisors are also excellent and included in your service.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Very little, but the good outweighs the bad. Occasionally, there are some page loading issues, but very minor when looking at the scope of the product.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Read these recommendations and see if there are some current Informz users, like myself, that would be happy to talk with you and their experiences before taking the plunge. Ask about experiences to help you decide if your team is ready to take on the new platform.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
There is so much that Informz offers us at a price point that our non-profit can afford, which is always an issue. We wanted to target market prior to using Informz, but the hand sorting of lists was painful. The fact that we can interact with our data and truly target market to our members is amazing. We've seen increased activity in opens/clicks and with our registrations!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Simplicity. Real magnet is a simple tool, like Constant Contact, to use for anyone that has any EMS experience, but the features are limited based on your package. The customer service is quite helpful as well and can resolve issues/inquiries quickly.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The mobile option is not truly responsive, but rather it creates another version of the email that can be viewed on a mobile device. It is a plus because you do not need to know how to code for mobile, but it is not truly optimized to create responsive design emails. Also, it could be the company I am with, but it would be ideal to see or create the full thread of a campaign (email, list, report) in one place.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
If you want a simple solution that also allows for dynamic content, go with Real Magnet. If you want to do any segmentations based on behavior, make sure that data is available elsewhere so you can upload the contacts to RM.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are pursuing dynamic content. The greatest issue is list consolidation and moving toward automation. There are several things that need to be in place (such as a data audit and integration of various systems) before relying on an EMS to do certain things.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic product that continues to evolve; and GREAT service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I have worked with Higher Logic since 2009. Many companies say they want to partner with you. Higher Logic is a true partner to us.  They continue to evolve the product in response to the market needs and are always soliciting customer input. If I so much as hint at being unhappy with something, they promptly contact me to get clarification and resolve it. The staff is friendly and genuinely wants their clients to be happy and productive. Of course, I am very pleased with the product itself (if it weren't great, I wouldn't be here, right?), but I just believe the comprehensive work this company is doing in the online community space is stellar and I am proud to be a client associated with it.  For example, they continue to provide superior resources and education in benchmarking community performance, and they partner with experts outside of the organization to do it.  Not only do they provide the product, but they provide you with the resources and education to be excellent at what you do.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I have no concerns about the product. Once in a blue moon I will have a bumpy service experience, but it gets resolved promptly. I'd love to go back to having a rating system in the libraries that is more refined than a "recommend it" button, but I also realize that's where the industry is (i.e., Facebook's "like it" thumbs up button - which yes, has refined a bit to allow additional "emotions" to be reflected).  I

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Be sure you are devoting adequate staff resources; don't hesitate to get involved in the user community. Understand that implementing an online community hinges on cultural change.  "If we build it, they will come" doesn't work!

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for a way to engage members in our special interest groups year-round, beyond a once-a-year face-to-face meeting.  Our online community quickly became one of our top two member benefits, and it is one that everyone gets to access. (Not everyone has the financial resources for professional conferences!) I love that our members feel like they have a relationship with staff as a result of their online interaction.  Every year since launch, we have seen our logins and usage increase. It has been a slow but steady climb, and this become a centerpiece of our member benefits.

I like how user friendly the platform is and how easy it was for our members to learn how to use the platform.  I also like how my own information is pulled in from LinkedIn to save me time from inputting my info again.  I like the individual communities and how our members are using them to share information.

There's nothing that I dislike, but I'm interested to see how it will integrated with our new AMS system.  I'm also interested to know if this product can somehow integrate with Phone2Action, which we use for advocacy efforts.

A great tool for beginners, and a transformative tool for those who have the time and staff to fully realize its potential.

all_reviews.review_title: Real Magnet is user-friendly, intuitive, and great for marketers new to marketing automation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Starting out in marketing automation can be a daunting task. You not only have to worry about developing the emails and content, but now you need to think through all the different scenarios, come up with different but engaging series, set up rules, segment out your audience, figure out timing, etc. Real Magnet really does simplify the whole process. Not great with email design? Real Magne offers a variety of email templates to work with. Not sure how the whole automation thing works? Real Magnet breaks down the setup of an auomation campaign into a few easy questions. And they offer common automation cmapaigns, incuding Welcome series, drip campaigns, event promotions, birthdays/anniversaries, and more. Managing your email lists and integrating your social media efforts are quite easy as well.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
We have come across some challenges with the images folders/archive. Anytime you'd like to edit an image, it will be saved as a copy. And most of the time, image editing takes us a couple tries or two to get it exactly right so we end up having multiple images in the image library. I should say though that you can organize and delete images through their Message Tools but that requires additional clicks and there is the risk of deleting an image that is being used in a live email (which will prevent the image from appearing in those emails).

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a full-service communications and marketing agency, we are constantly looking for new business and opportunities to expand our client base. As such, we need to engage with prospective customer (and existing customers) on a resgular basis.  But how do we do that? The answer was developing an email nurture program and adding an email signup button on our website. Visitors are encouraged to sign up to receive regular updates about industry trends/news, agency announcements, upcoming events, etc.

There are a number of benefits to this--continual engagement with our target audiences, integration with our social media marketing efforts, lead scoring capabilities, and providing personalized emails using dynamic content. And like any agency, we are constantly improving and evolving. Real Magnet makes it easy for us to can edit/revise/change our email marketing campaigns quickly and efficiently with new brand positioning, udpated services/offerings, etc. as we need.

all_reviews.review_title: Real Magnet - User Friendly, Multi-Purpose Outreach
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Real Magnet is a one-stop solution for the email communication chain. It has so many tools and templates, and integrates so seamlessly into our other sites and systems, that I can do everything in minutes.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The HTML conversion can be glitchy. Particularly when copying from an external HTML editor, formatting gets lost or characters get garbled. The editor tool also lacks flexibility, sometimes, to do really complicated formatting.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
I would highly recommend Real Magnet to anyone who wants to reach customers, whether for marketing or simply communication and feedback. Experienced marketers and designers can benefit from the robust functionality, while novice communicators have access to tools, templates, and support that make it easy to learn and use.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
My team primarily uses Real Magnet for customer outreach like notifying users of product changes or soliciting updates to account information. The marketing automation features have made it easy to track who has responded and to run reports of the responses to easily update our records or view tends in the feedback we receive.
One huge benefit is that we've gotten back the time we used to spend manually cataloging customer replies. In addition, we no longer to have to use messy spreadsheets to track which customers require additional contact.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The ease of sending out a basic message, along with the simplicity of their system when it comes to updating text/images for each message. We worked closely with their in-house designers on our template, and they were able to recreate our own internal design on their end with relative ease. They're super easy to work with, very responsive to any tech issues, and overall a pleasure.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Slightly complicated to review analytics for each issue; there should be a very basic dashboard with simple data that loads quickly and then more detailed options. Right now, it takes 30 seconds or so for the 'basic' dashboard to load, and then to delve into each item (opens, clicks) requires numerous clicks and a decent amount of back-and-forth. It's also slightly complicated to do basic A/B testing on subject lines; you have to go through an entire marketing automation sequence that could be streamlined if all you're looking for are the basics.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Be vocal with them if you have questions or concerns; don't just guess. They'll help you out.

They're also very open to suggestions; if something doesn't make sense to you, it probably doesn't make sense to others as well. Recommend a change to their system and they might just make it!

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our old system was an absolute nightmare; it's great to work with competent people and also gather analytics that we can trust to determine next steps. We also know that any changes we make down the line in terms of design will be handled properly on their end, and the care given to our newsletter will be top-notch.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
review_question_answers.answer: The ease of sending out a basic message, along with the simplicity of their system when it comes to updating text/images for each message. We worked closely with their in-house designers on our template, and they were able to recreate our own internal design on their end with relative ease. They're super easy to work with, very responsive to any tech issues, and overall a pleasure.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
review_question_answers.answer: Slightly complicated to review analytics for each issue; there should be a very basic dashboard with simple data that loads quickly and then more detailed options. Right now, it takes 30 seconds or so for the 'basic' dashboard to load, and then to delve into each item (opens, clicks) requires numerous clicks and a decent amount of back-and-forth. It's also slightly complicated to do basic A/B testing on subject lines; you have to go through an entire marketing automation sequence that could be streamlined if all you're looking for are the basics.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
review_question_answers.answer:
Be vocal with them if you have questions or concerns; don't just guess. They'll help you out.

They're also very open to suggestions; if something doesn't make sense to you, it probably doesn't make sense to others as well. Recommend a change to their system and they might just make it!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Our old system was an absolute nightmare; it's great to work with competent people and also gather analytics that we can trust to determine next steps. We also know that any changes we make down the line in terms of design will be handled properly on their end, and the care given to our newsletter will be top-notch.

all_reviews.review_title: Vastly improved interface caters to both coders and communicators
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The latest versions of the WYSIWYG editor for creating HTML newsletters are vastly improved over what existed prior. Whereas previously I would have to code and send all newsletters myself, now the door has been opened to train communicators to send their own HTML newsletters with little to no HTML/CSS experience.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There is still room for improvement in the WYSIWYG editor, and I always have to include in my training to others notes about the various bugs that occur when trying to change font styling from one look to another. I understand that this problem is intrinsic to most WYSIWYG editors, but it still is a point of aggravation. Some non-technical folks have a hard time wrapping their head around why they would have to change a line of styled text by starting at the 2nd letter, typing their new phrase, and then go back to delete the first letter (in order to avoid accidentally deleting the associated font styles). I haven't found a way to delete uploaded images either or even overwrite an existing one, which is either something that's just not made apparent to me or a glaring oversight.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
If possible, it's best to learn from someone who has experience with Real Magnet, as there are not a ton of resources available online to learn from.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
In my organization, we are trying to maintain a contact database and send mass emails all while collecting data on open/reads. The rate at which we can produce said emails is the greatest benefit we have realized.

all_reviews.review_title: Clean user experience with a few bumps in the road
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I've used many other marketing automation and email marketing platforms in the past. Real Magnet's email marketing is easy-to-use, especially when creating or re-suing email templates and placing copy. Sending emails is pretty foolproof when it comes to making sure that you've chosen the correct message and email list,

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There are a few hiccups that you'll hit along the way, that I feel could be smoother. For example, I've used other email marketing platforms that auto-update the HTML and web view, but with MagnetMail, you have to manually refresh.

I'm also getting used to lists/messages/send/track being siloed into their own compartments. With other platforms, it's more of a step-by-step process within itself, whereas with MagnetMail, it presents separate processes. Not the worst thing, but definitely takes some getting used to.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
At my current organization, we are trying to get away from sending larger scale client email campaigns through Outlook and move them to MagnetMail, mostly for tracking purposes.

all_reviews.review_title: A Vast Improvement for Our Internal Marketing Emails
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The layout is clean and it's easy to move components around. Having specific sections pre-sized within their respective templates makes it easier to construct a visually-appealing email blast without having to reinvent the wheel or waste time deliberating about the "right" resolution of your accompanying images.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I wish there were more and better organizational tools available to me, specifically with archiving old emails and assets. I submitted a support request to have folders activated, and their team responded quickly, providing me with folder functionality for old emails.

However, the navigation of these folders affects what you can see when you click different tabs at the top of the interface (which I did not know at first), so there are some minor annoyances associated with having to back up in my browser to access a different folder, just so I can review/edit a contact list, for example.

Additionally, I'd really like to be able to archive some of the folders and subfolders I've created within the email building toolset, but the options I'd be looking for are either absent or are grayed out.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
No concerns. Overall, this is a terrific way to enhance and simplify your email needs. There are, of course, other features that my company's Marketing team uses, but for my use the product performs admirably.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
My use of the system is strictly for internal communications to 1,000+ employees. Feedback has been overwhelmingly positive since my department began using RealMagnet.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The ease of use. The interface to create the emails is intuitive and easy to customize; updating emails and creating mobile versions is simple. I like having the ability to schedule my emails in advance. Even managing email lists is easier.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I'd like it to be a little easier to organize our files within RealMagnet. We can organize our messages into folders, but switching between folders takes a few more clicks than I'd like. And it's hard to sort through all the views of lists uploaded from our database - I wish there were a filter to only see views uploaded by a particular user, so I don't have to sort through all the lists that my colleagues have uploaded.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Take advantage of the experts on the RealMagnet team - they are incredibly friendly and knowledgeable, quick to recognize problems and to jump to find solutions.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
With RealMagnet, we can now draft, edit, schedule and send emails without being in the office- it's a great solution for people who travel, telework, or are concerned with business continuity planning.

Using RealMagnet to manage our email unsubscribes has not only simplified processes for us, but has also allowed us to better target our marketing, since we can now let people opt in or out from specific message categories instead of just one universal unsubscribe option.

But mostly, we are benefiting in the amount of time we save - we are able to create and send our marketing emails in a fraction of the time it used to take us.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The email creation interface is easy to use and allows for wide variation in design and content placement.  All of the Real Magnet support staff have been responsive, timely, and polite when we have had problems.  Once you get used to the template editor and know what to look for based on deliverability testing, the entire process, from concept to reporting, is fairly painless.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
We have run into difficulties with our social integration; it has been difficult to export consistent and accurate data using this tool.  It would also be nice to be able to delete posts directly from Real Magnet rather than needing to go to each individual platform.

There are certain limits to the automation tools (like A/B testing for ongoing campaigns) that would be nice to have, but haven't strongly impacted our process.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Real Magnet is an excellent tool to improve your marketing reach.  Be vocal with your account administrator about your ideas and your needs because, if they don't exist, your recommendation may lead them to be available soon.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Automation functionality allows us to set up campaigns that run consistently in the background.  We have been able to target groups that we couldn't before  and gain consistent conversions with only minimal set-up effort at the beginning of the campaign.  It is extremely simple to track the results of these campaigns at a glance (using the dashboard) or in depth (going into individual tracking information).  By combining landing pages and follow up campaigns, we have empowered our members to more easily make referrals and expand our membership without adding to our workload.  We are also able to better track those referred to our organization by these means.

Once you get used to the template editor and know what to look for based on deliverability testing, the entire process, from concept to reporting, is fairly painless.

review_question_answers.answer:
We have run into difficulties with our social integration; it has been difficult to export consistent and accurate data using this tool.  It would also be nice to be able to delete posts directly from Real Magnet rather than needing to go to each individual platform.

There are certain limits to the automation tools (like A/B testing for ongoing campaigns) that would be nice to have, but haven't strongly impacted our process.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
review_question_answers.answer: Real Magnet is an excellent tool to improve your marketing reach.  Be vocal with your account administrator about your ideas and your needs because, if they don't exist, your recommendation may lead them to be available soon.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The Automation functionality allows us to set up campaigns that run consistently in the background.  We have been able to target groups that we couldn't before  and gain consistent conversions with only minimal set-up effort at the beginning of the campaign.  It is extremely simple to track the results of these campaigns at a glance (using the dashboard) or in depth (going into individual tracking information).  By combining landing pages and follow up campaigns, we have empowered our members to more easily make referrals and expand our membership without adding to our workload.  We are also able to better track those referred to our organization by these means.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic capabilities, waiting on some improvements
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The marketing automation functionality of Real Magnet is the reason we decided to use them as our primary email provider. The ability to create organizational efficiency, connect with our customers using a data driven approach and customize our emails to fit the needs of our customers sets is outstanding. Real Magnet's willingness to add technical requests to their road maps that help fit our needs makes them a great partner who is working to shift the changing needs of the marketplace and their customers.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
The email dashboard capabilities are a huge challenge to my business. Being a data driven company, we want to have the oversight of our email trends for a number of capabilities and the data within the non-automated portion of system is clunky and difficult to use. The automation data is visually appealing and a great benefit for a report on an individual send, but the inability to review trends by categories, open rates, click through rates, etc. makes it difficult for us to make data driven decisions for email.

The SMS tool is also something we are interested in, but the lack of automation capabilities are also a huge challenge for our business.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Real Magnet is fairly intuitive to use, but it does not have the drag and drop functionality of some of the more basic email systems. Their strengths lie in a product that is built for organizations that want to take their communications beyond basic functionality and into the realm of truly customizing and automating customer communications in a smart and thoughtful way.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're trying to centralize our communications into one tool that has the bandwidth to send many emails in different formats and house one location for customer communications. The ability to formulate personalized and dynamic content based on data points is excellent. The integration with our data management system allows for a seamless flow of information in real team so that we are sending communications based upon current customer data - allowing for clean email sends and a cleaner database.

all_reviews.review_title: User Friendly Interface and Superlative Service Makes Real Magnet the Best Tool for Associations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Association executives wear many hats - few of us have the luxury of a dedicated e-mail marketing professional.  Yet, email remains the best channel for communicating with members.  Thus, it's vital to have access to an easy-to-use tool that keeps your association on the cutting edge of email communication with minimal investment of the chapter director's time.  Real Magnet is an exact fit for my needs.  More importantly, the service team is uber-responsive when I have questions or issues with deliverability. Also offers integrated survey and social media add-ons as well as marketing automation. I would highly recommend attending the conference to gain hands-on experience and make connections with various members of the Real Magnet team.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I wish Real Magnet offered more frequent training sessions.  The company offers excellent videos but I would have preferred in-person training to orient me to the new tool.   I would like to see my organization implement full integration with our association membership tool and offer access to the integrated survey tool and marketing automation - that's not a ding against Real Magnet - just something that needs to be worked out.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
I have use other email tools in prior positions, but prefer Real Magnet.  As with any tool, the people make the difference.  Can't say enough good things about the ease of access to expert resources and the helpful attitude of the Real Magnet team.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's a time of change for membership organizations as new, younger members seek a different value proposition than more tenured supporters.  The ability to easily curate, create and generate email communications to membership sub-sectors is vital to the success of any membership association today.  As my skills with the tool have progressed, I have seen our open-rate improve and attendance at events increase. With the help of my rep - Mike Colavita - I've been able to call upon deep resources to troubleshoot deliverability issues with individual members.  I look forward to using the marketing automation function and survey tools to increase member satisfaction levels and measure loyalty scores.

I send several emails that recur on a regular basis (some weekly, some monthly). I appreciate being able to use existing messages to build new messages. This saves an enormous amount of time.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I often have to go into the html source code to adjust things like font size, color, and links. The editing box often doesn't reflect changes to the code. And often extraneous code will pop up out of nowhere. I wish there were more options to customize templates myself rather than having to contact Real Magnet to do it.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Real Magnet makes it easy to track who has received messages, who opens them, and who deletes them. The tracking features have helped us know when it's best to send messages to get the biggest impact.

When we want to send an email to all of our clients, with Real Magnet we can accomplish this is in just a few minutes.  We are able to customize the email with our letterhead and even attach hyperlinks within the email.  After sending the email, we can monitor who has read the email (and know who clicked the hyperlink).  This setting makes it very easy for us to know what clients we need to follow up with.

all_reviews.review_content:

Real Magnet provides an overall solid email marketing and marketing automation solution which provides companies the tools to create targeted emails and campaigns. The marketing automation setup is straightforward to use and multiple campaign options.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I wish there was more flexibility in using templates for emails and modifying them. If you choose a theme, there are parts you can change and other components which may or may not come with a theme. All templates should have access to the components and not be limited to what is offered in that template.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Check out all the functionalities to see if Real Magnet can provide what you need. I wouldn't say what they offer is different from others but it is a solid email and marketing automation solution.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're looking for ways to automate some processes for our association but that will depend on how our integration with our AMS program goes.

all_reviews.review_title: Real Magnet helps you reach your customers quickly in a professional manner
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
I like that Real Magnet allows you to create custom templates to easily create and distribute mass emails.  I like that it allows you to copy and edit previous emails for future needs.  It allows you to send a professional-looking email to a large group of people quickly.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
An item that makes it a little more challenging and time consuming is the fact that you have to make edits in 3 different locations every time you edit- URL, Text, and Mobile.  It would be much more convenient if once you made edits/updates to the HTML that it would automatically update the text and mobile versions as well as update the desired formatting.

Also, if a contact chooses to "unsubscribe" it doesn't just unsubscribe them from that contact list, group, or email... it removes them from all future emails you attempt to send to them.  This is problematic as they may want to receive other emails but are unable to.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Make sure you get the version that includes all the components you are looking to have access to.  The tutorials are great for trying new things, but only if you have access to use those new, innovative tools.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to quickly reach a mass group of customers with a message and allow them to directly reply back to me with questions.  I love that i can reach a large group of people quickly and professionally.  I have realized the benefit of a professional email over a standard outlook email, and it also allows customers to access items linked within the body of the email.

all_reviews.review_title: A personal email service provider experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
While the product is easy to use and stable, what I like most about Real Magnet is having a dedicated account executive (great job Frank!) who answers my call on those occasions when I cannot figure out how to accomplish the task at hand.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Because of changes made by Real Magnet last year treating null as a value, uploading data above and beyond just email address if updating the existing data as part of the upload now requires admin privileges in order to update the data (at least in our account). Since we have around 70 users but just 2 active admin users, this creates an undesired bottleneck.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
We have looked at Eloqua, Marketo, Hub Spot, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Informz, and other products. With the larger vendors mentioned, you do not receive the sort of individual support that we receive from Real Magnet. In fact, once the contract is signed with some of those vendors, you may even have a hard time even ever hearing from your sales rep again.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Magnet Mail for many different purposes. At the time we first started using it we have 14 different ESP's and/or email systems being used to send email to members, prospective members, and educators. We desired one platform that could meet the needs of all 14 systems to consolidate them all down to one. We didn't quite make it to one, but we came very close.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
There is a standard of excellence that we try to live up to being associated with MIT. Everyone expects us to do things smartly. Real Magnet has allowed us to market so much smarter. It's changed the way we think about our customers and our products on a daily basis.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Please allow landing page creative to copy when you 'save as' a landing page campaign. Any other limitations seem to have been taken care of or are in the works to improve.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
You will not be disappointed- by the product or the RM team.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Not only are we growing our audience but getting so much better at sharing content, offers, and information with them.

The breadth of Real Magnet's capabilities in terms of design, email delivery, and tracking has saved us time and money by eliminating superfluous platforms/software systems and streamlined our process to one place.

The most surprising aspect has been how many users we've added and need to add. Originally we believed our Marketing team would be the only users of Real Magnet but as we use it (and especially after RMUG) we will be recommending it to members of the sales, editorial, and web teams.

all_reviews.review_title: Looking for a Communication Platform with Professional Service Partnership - Real Magnet is for you.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Real Magnet is responsive, and I truly value them as a communications partner. The professionals on their staff have always listened to my goals, my concerns and my "wish list" and responded with solutions that surpass my expectations.

The tracking features are excellent too. More than once this feature has provided us with the information we need to quickly show our communication efforts are effectively getting into recipients hands, who is engaging - and even where and how. In any business, it's important to be able show the results of you work and Real Magnet makes it easy.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
There is not much to dislike about Real Magnet!  The user interface has a few formatting quirks, but any program or platform has those - and once you learn to work around them, they are nothing critical.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Do it. If communication are in your business plan - you won't regret partnering with Real Magnet.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have and RSS feed linked directly to our Blog subscription list. Real Magnet partnered with our web developer to not only make the process seamless, but they right-sized the functionality to our specific needs. There are additional automation options that we can choose to turn on in the future, ourselves, when we are ready.

We are now in the process of integrating a database- allowing further  The integration solutions Real Magnet provides allows for streamlined communications while saving our company hours of manual data entry time.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
RealMagnet allows you to generate professional looking emails using a template. It has a number of features, including tracking emails and whether or not they are delivered, opened, etc. Once you get the hang of how RealMagnet functions, it is a reliable mass-mailer.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
Some of the features (including/especially the copy and paste features) are finicky and a knowledge of HTML is necessary to debug emails to avoid errors or display anomalies. If steps are not completed in the proper order, it can cause more errors. It's not terribly intuitive, and so navigating RealMagnet's many features is difficult without a tutorial.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
It takes some getting use to, but RealMagnet's functionality and reliability make it the best available option.

all_reviews.review_title: Real Magnet is Effective Email Marketing Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Real Magnet has a straightforward, easy-to-use marketing automation tool to enable the set-up of complex to simple campaigns. It's a great option for businesses wanting to delve into automation, without becoming overwhelmed by over-technical set-up.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I recently discovered that Real Magnet calculates click rates based on the (number of clicks in a message/number of messages sent). It makes more sense for our business to calculate this rate as the (number of clicks in a message/number of messages opened) to get an accurate understanding of recipient behavior and message effectiveness.

Due to this calculation method I have to alter my metrics reporting from what Real Magnet supplies, causing an extra step in my process.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
The automation tool for split tests has recently been useful to our business. The set-up is much more straightforward and streamlined compared to the old A/B testing tool. Makes dividing audiences, measuring success, and sending winning messages a breeze!

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful but easy to use email marketing program
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
The ability to design an email with an easy to use platform. You can setup templates that saves you time when designing emails. You can run tracking reports on individual emails or you can compare emails over a period of time to determine what subject line had the most opens, the best time of  day to send an email, etc.

Integration with Salesforce makes it easy to add new contacts to your email lists.

Live support is very good.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
You can't have more than one browser window open at the same time. Their help documentation could be improved.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
You definitely need to go through their training program. Sometimes you will need to be able to code HTML without their interface.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been able to easily determine which emails perform the best and which emails are not doing good at all. We are now looking at their marketing automation program.

all_reviews.review_title: The single best decision our Association has made...
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Higher Logic Thrive?
Higher Logic significantly increases member engagement through its private networking community platform.

We have also been able to use the platform to provide our website as the front end of the private communities and discussion forums.

The clever backend has meant that we have been able to cater for our 7 Divisions/Chapters by providing them with their own microsite, plus it allows us to have a fully integrated event calendar, libraries and discussion forums.

Higher Logic are constantly upgrading the platform as part of our annual subscription.

What do you dislike about Higher Logic Thrive?
I can't say that I dislike anything about the Higher Logic platform. I am very satisfied with what we have been able to implement and achieve.

Recommendations to others considering Higher Logic Thrive:
Higher Logic can suggest best practice guides when implementing the platform. Using best practice can dramatically improve the results / outcomes.

What problems is Higher Logic Thrive solving and how is that benefiting you?
Over the past 3 years, our integrated approach to using Higher Logic as our private networking community and website, combined with our content marketing approach to our communications has resulted in our membership increasing by 68%, our prospects 126% and our website hits and increased five fold.

We have a membership of nearly 4,000 but we have been able to increase our broader industry prospects and contacts to around 18,000. People want to connect to our private networking community.
